sentences.english: Method The technique of direct powder compression was adopted using compressible starch as the main excipient .

sentences.english: Just reach into the powder and pull out your wrench.

sentences.english: A method to measure the absorptivity of powder coatings on metal surfaces is presented.

sentences.english: Lester was gone, and I brushed the powder away before anyone could see it.

sentences.english: The pebbles were beaten to a fine dust.
The advantages and applications of powder metallurgy materials in electrical appliances are briefly introduced.

sentences.english: Powder Metallurgy is a process for making parts from metal powder.

sentences.english: It is characterized by containing concave and convex rod stone powder in said paste.

sentences.english: Apply powder liberally as often as necessary by shaking powder into your hand and smoothing onto skin.

sentences.english: A type of recovery booth that incorporates a cartridge filter system to collect overspray powder.

sentences.english: The fine grain of pure tantalum can be obtained easily through PM.
